idea:
eFilingGuru is managed by a team of people who have wide experience and expertise in their respective fields. Our Professional Team is a knowledge based group which endeavors to provide best and wide spectrum of corporate services at one stop. We wish to establish ourselves as a destination where all paths in hunt for corporate solutions end. We have strong foundations by which we wish to achieve robust growth. Our diversified and dedicated team of professionals has expertise in providing supreme corporate services. Our strong operating culture defines our process effectiveness that aims at delivering real business results and strategic value to our clients. We integrate our capabilities with those of our client's to drive business process effectiveness with the objective to increase efficiencies and improve business outcomes. We see our relationships with clients as strategic, long term, and enduring.
eFilingGuru offers the right skills and services for such an approach. Our expanding list of service offerings allows us to assist our clients with a broad range of solutions. We often start work with a client in one domain and end up developing the relationship to encompass others. This proven customer engagement model, where we start small, deliver value, expand business scope, and gradually penetrate other areas, provides us with growth and long-term revenue visibility. We wish to provide information which is based on the stated and unstated needs of different individuals/corporates that confirm to professional ethics, integrity & confidentiality.
name: eFilingGuru.Com

idea: The SOS (Save Our Society) is next generation Voice activated emergency alarm system. It is equipped with the ultramodern voice recognition technology. It is an offline speech recognition security system for detecting, processing and reporting emergency situation at the installed location such as home, offices, shops, banks, ATMs. It helps you guard yourself and your family against risks of all kinds, when at home.
name: NISHNA INNOVATIVE SYSTEMS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: 'The Flapper Life' is a women travel and lifestyle company for the women, of the women and by the women. The Company engages in inspiring global women from various walks of life to come together and enjoy, travel to exotic destinations in groups, learn new skills or just live an experience which they always dreamt of living.
name: The Flapper Life

idea:
Company Profile
Dear Sir,
Greetings from Ashtavinayak Plast Containers Pvt Ltd.
We are pleased to introduce ourselves as a manufacturer of rigid plastic packaging containers (Pails) in Western India.
Ashtavinayak Plast is involved in the manufacturing of injection-molded containers (pail) for lubricants oil, paints, food, Chemical, and other industrial products.
To our valued customers we offer the highest quality and sustainable packaging solutions in a cost effective manner. we strive to create a strong customer base which will be built on the basis of our services, product reliability, and market excellence.
We are happy to introduce our 7.5 liter,10 Liter, 20 liter, 18 kg, 10 kg and 3kg containers (pail) for the Paint, Lubricants, Chemical, food and bio fertilizer industry.
We have designed our pails keeping in to account the safety and quality of the customer’s products. These pails are provided with tamper proof lids to ensure complete safety against adulteration.
name: ASHTAVINAYAK PLAST CONTAINERS PVT LTD

idea:
Remitout Service Private Limited started in 2017, is a technology-driven Forex service provider company.  We deal in 26 currencies & counting more on our platform. Today Remitout provides three major products i.e Wire transfer, Forex card and Cash currency to Indian customers.


Remitout is India’s first ever completely Digital paperless online platform in the cross currency exchange sector. We are bootstrapped by the founding team.  


Remitout currently focuses on students going overseas for education.  We provide online solutions for their wire transfer, currency and forex card requirements.  Going forward we plan to cater to other foreign exchange requirements of Indian Residents as permitted under LRS by RBI.


To execute the foreign exchange requirements for our customers we have got into arrangements with a few RBI licensed Authorised dealers II having pan India presence with offices across country.
name: REMITOUT SERVICE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We are a start-up that is looking to manufacture and market IoT base healthcare products with a special emphasis. Most commercial products in the market are a result of just reducing prices with no followup to a physician or doctor and the products cater to only with best mobile connectivity i.e. 3G rather than GSM only. 

We need help in getting all the appropriate firm who would help in putting the IoT chip on the Glucometer to start with.

Request help from Industry experts and government officials.
Gardenpaper has created a healthcare services platform for diabetic patient care with the intent to daily doctor visit and enabling a check of patient data via a browser enabled front end for the patients and doctors. This also ensures better utilisation of existing resources [ i.e. doctors and physicians ] to serve more patients. The helps in patient time to travel to location of doctor everyday.

This Project with miniaturisation of equipment, and software programs are now making it possible for a diabetic monitor to be reached farther into the talukas, districts and outer periphery of Tier I and Tier II cities, and help save lives.

How We Plan To Proceed?


1. Increase the reach of patients connected to district hospitals

2. App for doctors to track their patients

3. Cloud-based application for Doctors and Physicians to only attend the patients who have reading beyond the normal.

4. Standardized prices & processes

Innovations:

1. Modular Glocometer SIM card based.
2. Smart Plans for doctors to get patients attached.

We want to extend such low cost, low-powered tech-powered innovative services to the population throughout India.
name: Gardenpaper
